title: Community taxi drivers

pars: The House would also like to hear from people who are interested in becoming drivers in its Community Taxi Service.
Supported by the Victorian Department of Transport, the Community Taxi program is run independently of the federally-supported patient transport program outlined at left.
RCH Community Taxi services will be run using a modern Kia fi ve door people mover (below left), which can accommodate a driver and seven passengers in three rows of seats.
Early this week, its compulsory magnetic “Commercial Passenger Vehicle” sign arrived, heralding the imminent start of the new Rushworth-based taxi service.
The Kia taxi may also be used for some patient transport services, subject to approval from relevant state and federal authorities.

abstract:
The House would also like to hear from
people who are interested in becoming
drivers in its Community Taxi Service.
